Hud

Ano: 1963

Sinopse: Hud Bannon is a ruthless young man who tarnishes everything and everyone he touches. He represents the perfect embodiment of alienated youth: out for kicks with no regard for the consequences. There is bitter conflict between the callous Hud and his stern, highly-principled father Homer. Hud's nephew Lon admires Hud's cheating ways, though he soon becomes too aware of Hud's reckless amorality to bear him anymore. In the world of the takers and the taken, Hud is a winner. He's a cheat, but, he explains "I always say the law was meant to be interpreted in a lenient manner."—alfiehitchie
